answers.answer: It makes me sick everytime... I got fruit punch this time and it was some better but my body can't handle it.

It honestly doesn't taste THAT bad. Just make sure it's real cold that helped me. It kinda tastes like a melted orange freezie pop. It's not the best thing you'll ever drink, but it's really not too bad. At least I didn't think so, I didn't have at trouble getting it down or keeping it down. Though it did make me very jittery and I did feel like crap after words and didn't feel better until I got home and ate something and took a nap. Good luck!
The orange is nasty stuff I asked my office for the lemon lime it tastes more like flat sugary sprite. That orange has ruined orange pop or drinks for me at all

I have my glucose tolerance test on Wednesday. I'm just going to chug the stuff. Its not supposed to taste good-its basically orange flavored humming bird food & the faster you get it in your system, the more accurate the test will be. Make sure you bring a healthy, high protein snack, like nuts or Greek yogurt, and a large amount of water to help balance your blood sugar after the test or it'll make you feel yucky all day! I've had to do this for my hypoglaucemia & it can make for a rough day if you don't getbyour sugar levels stabilized!
